name: Dylan

projects.title: Kaiju Clash
projects.description: University Module Name: Collaborative Game Development. My Focus: Power-ups Mechanic & UI Mechanic Integration

services.title: Staffordshire University, Stoke Campus (Current)
services.description: I am currently in my 3rd year of BSc Games Development at Staffs, averaging above the 70% first-class threshold. I am growing my skills and proficiency in VR, AI, and collaborative development.

services.title: South Staffordshire College, Lichfield
services.description: My further education consisted of a Level 3 UAL Extended Diploma in Games Production and HNC for Games Development that both resulted in a Distinction and led me to higher education.

services.title: King Edward VI, Lichfield
services.description: My high school years concluded with 11 total GCSEs, with 10 of them being grades 7 to 9 (A to A**). My most proficient subjects were Maths, Physics, and Computer Science.

services.title: Retail Employment
services.description: I am currently working at B&M as a customer service supervisor, honing not only my people skills and collaborative working but also my managerial skills as I am in charge of the "front of house" staff.

aboutpara: I am a 21-year-old gamer with a passion for creating. I have been invested in game development since my first Quill18Creates tutorial in 2014 and have never looked back. I have pursued it in education since 2020 with my diploma in games production. More recently, I completed a HNC as part of my path toward a degree in game development, which I am in the final year of. I am also an avid gym-goer and car fanatic with an interest in anything with a combustion engine.

resume.tagline: I'm a student Games Developer and part-time Customer Service Supervisor at B&M.
resume.description: I have created several prototypes and products primarily in Unreal Engine. I am mainly preficient with VR, AI, and mechnanics development.

experiences.bullets: Work as a part of the managerial team to provide a well-rounded experience for customers, Manage the front of house team with efficiency, Handle the store's banking and take responsibilty for the cash flow

education.universityPara: I am working towards my first-class BSc (Hons) Computer Games Development. I have grown as a person and developer in my time at Staffs. I am working above a 70% average with my highest grades being in VFX, VR, AI, and C++ for engines.
